channel.title: Need help! rep++
channel.description:
[center]I purchased a VPS from: VPSDEPOT.com
I uploaded all of my server files, but now I don't know how to run the run.bat file making it so other can play my server!
If someone can help, that'd be great.
I [b]will [/b]use teamviewer if that is easier for you.[/center]

item.title: Need help! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

More information is required, the most likely issue is that you’ve bought a Linux VPS and your server is Windows based. You’ll need to change a few paths I think(I’ve never ran an rsps of linux) and put the run cmd in. Also, they might not have installed java on your machine so you might need to install it. Sorry I’m not of more use, I don’t use linux. A simple thing though is if its Linux, ask for a vps using the derritivate called Ubuntu as its like windows’ish and theres a programme called WINE which is an windows emulator.
I have no idea what your problem is tbh, please be more specific.

Read full topic
